mapper.select: select id, title, cntnt, author, read_cnt , date_format(reg_dt,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') reg_dt , date_format(st_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') st_dt , date_format(ed_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ed_dt , (select count(*) from tb_attach where notice_id = notice.id) attach_cnt from tb_notice notice where now() between st_dt and ed_dt and dbsts = 'A' order by reg_dt desc

select notice.id, title, cntnt, author, read_cnt , date_format(notice.reg_dt,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') reg_dt , date_format(st_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') st_dt , date_format(ed_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ed_dt , attach.id attach_id, original_nm , date_format(attach.reg_dt,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') attach_reg_dt from tb_notice notice inner join tb_attach attach on attach.notice_id = notice.id where notice_id = #{id}
